description: Abschnitt der Kernteilung eukaryotischer Zellen mit Halbierung des Chromosomenbesatzes
label: Meiose
subclass_of: Abfolge von physiologischen Ereignissen in Zellen

a biological process that directly contributes to the process of producing new individuals by one or two organisms. The new individuals inherit some proportion of their genetic material from the parent or parents
subclasses: Abfolge von physiologischen Ereignissen in Zellen

a biological process that directly contributes to the process of producing new individuals by one or two organisms. The new individuals inherit some proportion of their genetic material from the parent or parents
has_parts: The process in which genetic material, in the form of chromosomes, is organized into specific structures and then physically separated and apportioned to two or more sets during M phase of the meiotic cell cycle.
The aggregation, arrangement and bonding together of a set of components to form the spindle that contributes to the process of meiosis.
The formation of the spindle midzone, the area in the center of the spindle where the spindle microtubules from opposite poles overlap, as a part of the process of meiosis.
One of the two nuclear divisions that occur as part of the meiotic cell cycle
